code: import Dimensions from'../Dimensions';export default class PixelRatio{static get(){return Dimensions.get('window').scale;}static getFontScale(){return Dimensions.get('window').fontScale||PixelRatio.get();}static getPixelSizeForLayoutSize(layoutSize){return Math.round(layoutSize*PixelRatio.get());}static roundToNearestPixel(layoutSize){var ratio=PixelRatio.get();return Math.round(layoutSize*ratio)/ratio;}}
